name: Selling Expenses
description: Expenses necessary for the company to directly interface with customers.

childCategories.name: Sales Expenses
childCategories.description: Salaries and wages of salespeople including commissions, payroll taxes, and benefits.

childCategories.name: Marketing
childCategories.description: Expenses directly related to company's product line, assets, services, brand, or image.

childCategories.name: Advertising
childCategories.description: Expenses related to advertising, including print, radio, television, and online.

name: General Expenses
description: Expenses necessary for the company to operate.

childCategories.name: Utilities
childCategories.description: Expenses related to the use of utilities, including electricity, water, and gas.

childCategories.name: Rent
childCategories.description: Expenses related to the use of a building or other property.

childCategories.name: Office Equipment
childCategories.description: Expenses related to the use of office equipment, including computers, printers, and fax machines.

childCategories.name: Supplies
childCategories.description: Expenses related to the use of office supplies, including paper, pens, and staples.

childCategories.name: Insurance
childCategories.description: Expenses related to insurance, including liability, property, and workers' compensation.

childCategories.name: Travel & Accomodations
childCategories.description: Expenses related to travel and accomodations, including airfare, hotels, and meals.

childCategories.name: Recreation & Entertainment
childCategories.description: Expenses related to recreation and entertainment, including tickets, meals, and events.

name: Adminstrative Expenses
description: Expenses necessary for the company to manage its operations.

childCategories.name: Accounting Payroll
childCategories.description: Expenses related to accounting and payroll services.

childCategories.name: Human Resources
childCategories.description: Expenses related to human resources services.

childCategories.name: Consulting Fees
childCategories.description: Expenses related to external consulting services for administrative purposes.
